naslov: Legalizirana kućica 49m2 na parceli 1700m2 – Pučišća, otok Brač (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo u ekskluzivnoj prodaji manje kuće površine 49m2 na parceli od 1700m2 u mirnom i idiličnom okruženju u mjestu Pučišća, otok Brač. Kuća je prizemnica u roh-bau izvedbi sa postavljenim vratima i prozorima, a sastoji se od jedne prostorije standardne visine i otvorenim potkrovljem, što daje osjećaj prostranosti unutar objekta. Krov je u odličnom stanju, a unutrašnjost novi vlasnik može pregraditi i urediti prema svojim željama. Okruženje je mirno i prepuno zelenila i maslinika, pa je odlično mjesto za bijeg od gradske gužve i buke kako bi se uživalo u miru i tišini. Okućnica daje dovoljno mjesta za vrt, maslinik i parking. Struja i voda su na udaljenosti 200m. Vlasništvo je uredno i bez tereta. Udaljenost od mora i centra mjesta Pučišća je svega 1,2km, pa tko voli rekreaciju to bi bilo 15min hoda ili svega par minuta biciklom ili autom. Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Agencijska provizija je 3% Kontakt:  091/561-5115 ŽELJANA Legalized house 49m2 on a plot of 1700m2 - Pučišća, the island of Brač We mediate in the exclusive sale of a smaller house with an area of 49m2 on a plot of 1700m2 in a peaceful and idyllic environment in Pučišća, the island of Brač. The house is a one-story house in roh-bau design with installed doors and windows and consists of one room of standard height and an open attic, which gives a feeling of spaciousness inside the building. The roof is in excellent condition, and the interior can be partitioned and arranged by the new owner according to his wishes. The surroundings are peaceful and full of greenery and olive groves, so it's a great place to escape from the hustle and bustle of the city to enjoy peace and quiet. The yard provides enough space for a garden, olive grove, and parking. Electricity and water are at a distance of 200m. The house is completely legal without a mortgage. The distance between the house to the sea and the center of Pučišća is only 1.2 km, so if you like recreation, it would be a 15-minute walk or just a few minutes by bike or car. Viewing the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Agency commission is 3% Contact: +385915615115 ŽELJANA
